description: Mikey shouldn't have quit working at my gym. He's a personal trainer who owed me for two sessions and I was determined to get what was owed to me. Mikey woke up in his underwear, tied up and wondering what the hell was going on. I told him right away what was up and he didn't seem to acknowledge that he owed me. That was a bad attitude to have considering the position he was currently in. He protested when I took his shoes off to reveal his dirty, smelly, socked feet but I wasn't about to let him go. His socks and feet smelled SO good. By the time I had his socks off and was worshiping his size 11 feet Mikey was incredibly turned on. So much so that I took his clothes off and proceeded to jerk him off until he shot a nice load of cum!
title: Mikey Tied Up & Worshiped
